text: @john_swinamer Hi, John! We are sorry to hear about the issues with this offer. Please send us a DM and we would be happy to provide further guidance! ^SD

@unitedwayhh After a challenging couple of years, and the focus on physically health, many have forgotten the importance of mental health. We appreciate everything you do to ensure we have healthy minds, bodies, and souls. ^SF
